title: The First Kiss
description: James Knightley's brothers worry he spends too much time at the office. But personal failures have caused James to find solace in his work as a law expertâ€¦ and in the unfailing comfort of his little black book. Vera is a twice-divorced mom, fiercely protective of her young daughter, and a world-class piano soloist.
